mapper.select: SELECT BOARDID, BOARDTITLE, BOARDCONTENT, BOARDDATE, MEMBERID FROM BOARDS WHERE boards.boardcategory = #{categoryType} ORDER BY BOARDDATE OFFSET (#{end} - #{start})*(#{pageNo}-1) ROWS FETCH NEXT 10 ROWS ONLY

select boards.BOARDID, BOARDTITLE, BOARDCONTENT, BOARDDATE, BOARDCATEGORY, REPORTDEADLINE, SUBMISSIONSUBMITDATE, SUBMISSIONSCORE, boards.MEMBERID, membername from boards left join members on boards.memberid = members.memberid where boards.BOARDID=#{boardId}
mapper.insert: insert into boards (BOARDID, BOARDTITLE, BOARDCONTENT, BOARDDATE, BOARDCATEGORY, MEMBERID) VALUES ( SEQ_BOARDID.NEXTVAL, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, sysdate, #{boardCategory}, #{memberId})
mapper.select: select BOARDID, BOARDTITLE, BOARDCONTENT, BOARDDATE, BOARDCATEGORY, REPORTDEADLINE, SUBMISSIONSUBMITDATE, SUBMISSIONSCORE, MEMBERID, REPORTDEADLINETIME, REPORTNOTICEID from boards where memberId=#{memberId}, boardId=#{boardId}
